message:
I'm not familiar with Android Activities. However, if `OnCreate` is an event handler (or *logically* an event handler), you can just use `async void`.

You should never use `Task.Factory.StartNew` (use `Task.Run` instead, if you need it): [http://blog.stephencleary.com/2015/03/a-tour-of-task-part-9-delegate-tasks.html](http://blog.stephencleary.com/2015/03/a-tour-of-task-part-9-delegate-tasks.html)
